Description:
FUNKY FAMILY LIVING
Flowing spaces and family places fuse together to make this the perfect home in the zone. Warm and spacious and situated on a fabulous allotment of 668.5 sq m (approx) and surrounded by enchanting established gardens this elegant brick Californian Bungalow has been extended to accommodate a large family. Comprising entrance hall, downstairs main bedroom with two way ensuite, second bedroom BIR, charming study/library, formal living (OFP) and all cleverly zoned from the huge light filled informal living area incorporating a fabulous kitchen for the entertainer, separate laundry and powder room and leading to large landscaped rear garden perfect for outdoor parties under the canopy of trees and complemented with a huge artist's studio. Upstairs three further bedrooms, family bathroom and a feature fireman's pole direct to the informal living area make this a funky family home complete with airconditioning, ducted heating, soloar panelts, polished boards and fine period features.
Insights: 48 Stewart Street, ORMOND VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 8 other 5 bedroom house in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
Zone location, Vogue inspiration
Step into the pages of a magazine... & start living the dream with Vogue living. Renovated & styled out with rare flair, this 2 bedroom unit has living flowing back to a luxe Blanco kitchen, a latte-toned bathroom starring separate shower & bath plus a private WC & a mix of slick polished porcelain tiling & plush carpets throughout. There's a clever pantry tucked behind an opaque glass door & streamlined built-in-robes ...even the practicalities have designer style with sleek panel heating, reverse-cycle air-con & a landscaped paved courtyard securely accessing the garage. Set on the edge of McKinnon Hill, well within the McKinnon College Zone, this is a true designer original!
open-plan living with Blanco kitchen, designer bathroom, sep WC, panel heating, air-con, garage, McKinnon College Zone, Hill position

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT!
Step inside to a surprisingly bright and comfortable, tastefully presented 3 bedroom 1st floor security apartment. This warm retreat is one of only eight apartments in the complex which prides itself on its level of security, and property maintenance and appearance. Number 8, enjoys an entrance hall, spacious living area leading to a quiet 1st bedroom, a large sun filled kitchen with a casual dining area attached. A further 2 bedrooms (BIRs) and a glistening bathroom/laundry, with black and white checked floor tiles. Enjoying quality carpet throughout, and neutral tones you will either enjoy this beauty or add your own personal flair. This meticulously maintained haven also has the benefit of undercover security parking. Located only a short walk to Ormond train station, and the busy, bustling North Road shops.

Description:
Sleek & Sophisticated!
Sleek & sophisticated with an edge that comes from a stylish renovation, great presentation & a fresh decor, this exciting apartment - upstairs, front, in a neat 2-storey block - has undercover car space & visitor's parking within walking distance of Ormond shops & amenities. Enter the apartment to be met by gleaming timber floors, a living room (A/C & space heater) with sunlight streaming through balcony doors, an in-trend separate kitchen/meals area with stainless steel appliances (including 2-drawer D/W) & attractive cabinetry, double size bedrooms (BIRs), & a neutral bathroom with full laundry facilities.
Chris Janssens : 0418 541 208

Description:
Streetfront sensation in the Zone
Wait until you see the sensational use of space in this streetfront sensation! Opening up beyond a high-gabled facade, this stylish 2 storey town-residence showcases 2 free-flowing living areas on the ground-floor, & 2 soaring vaulted-ceiling double bedrooms up above. Appointed to the highest standard with parquetry floors & CaesarStone benchtops (even the laundry), this heated & alarmed home features a Blanco kitchen, a designer bathroom plus powder-room & a big double garage. Best of all, this high quality home features sunny side gardens with an entertainer's deck (perfect to stretch out in the sun) ...and a prized McKinnon College address (perfect to stretch your investment dollar!). Land 250sqm approx.
dual living, decking, Blanco kitchen, C'Stone benchtops, parquetry, ducted heating, alarm, double garage, College Zone address

Description:
Classic Californian, leafy locale!
Find covetable comfort and perfect potential in a leafy location. In a tree-lined street within a few bocks of Ormond strip and station, this solid-brick three bedroom Californian Bungalow is already updated with stainless-steel kitchen appliances (including a Miele dishwasher) and a modern skylit bathroom...now it's all ready to the next vision! Appreciate the beauty of warm polished boards, sparkling leadlight and a wonderfully well-proportioned floorplan with separate lounge and dining rooms...then step out the back door and see the potential to extend into this sunny north-westerly backyard. Centrally heated and cooled with a restorable fireplace and a garage in the big backyard, you can sleep comfortably and dream of the future in this Californian dream! For more information about this solid-brick Californian Bungalow contact Halli Moore at Buxton Brighton on 0403 777 661

Description:
Zone in on a new level of living
Step up to the Zone on Ormond Hill! Stepping up over 3 split levels, this 3 bedroom plus study, 2.5 bathroom contemporary home takes family entertainment to a new level with 2 free-flowing side-by-side living zones, a vast street-level rumpus room (or home-theatre) & tiered gardens stepping from paved BBQ area to heated pool & spa. With a top-floor sleeping zone fronted by a tree-top view master-suite & luxuries including ducted heating & air-con, alarm & auto-watering, this modern classic has been updated with a sleek granite & Euro appliance kitchen & stone bathroom benchtops. A walk to the College, a moment to the bus, this is the level of in-Zone living your family deserves. Land 720sqm approx.
3 bedrooms, study/4th, 2.5 bathrooms,
lounge/dining, casual & rumpus zones
granite kitchen, heating, air-con, alarm
double garage, McKinnon College Zone

Ready to delight in the coveted McKinnon Secondary College zone with alarm, ducted heating & off-street parking for the whole family!

Description:
Relaxed Living!
In an orderly and tranquil 4-unit block, this single-storey home is presented with pizzazz and offers a relaxing, laidback lifestyle in easy distance of Ormond Village shops, train and buses. Polished hardwood floors add to the engaging ambience, and there are carpets in the bedrooms, which have built-in wardrobes. The comfortable living room has a heater; the separate kitchen has space for meals; and there is a neat wraparound courtyard where you can enjoy the sunshine in privacy. Separate laundry; bathroom with separate toilet; venetian blinds; external sunblinds; lockup garage.
Chris Janssens : 0418 541 208

Description:
A Villa with Vision
Neatly maintained on this private corner, this sun filled 2 bedroom villa maintains its original charm on a uniquely shaped block. With no common land, this tidy number enjoys a north facing living room (gas heater), classic kitchen with dining area, 2 double bedrooms (BIRs), shower room, updated bathroom, dual access toilet and a laundry with access to the generous courtyard garden. Hidden behind the established garden borders, this idyllic renovator, first home or investment features ducted heating, neat carpets, good storage, window shutters and a garage on own drive. An excellent opportunity to put your stamp on this well positioned property, moments to North Road shops, cafes, restaurants, parks, train & bus services.

Description:
Period Perfect with a Modern Twist!
An old favourite for a new generation, this dazzling Deco has been masterfully renovated yet retains classic period features like polished hardwood floors, ceiling roses, picture rails & deep window ledges! Featuring three generous robed bedrooms, luxurious bathroom with spacious shower & separate bath, splendid stainless-steel appliance kitchen with glass splashbacks & timber-topped island bench, formal dining area with open fireplace, auto garage, ducted heating, r/c air-conditioning, ample landscaped front garden and even a fully enclosed, elevated & decked entertainment area! Freshly repainted throughout, there is nothing to do here but enjoy your 'in-zone' status close to McKinnon Primary & Secondary College!..

Description:
Gracious, spacious & Zone located!
Picket-fenced, bay-windowed and brilliantly accommodating, this one is high on family flair at a highly-sought McKinnon College address. Cleverly zoned with kids' bedrooms in a rear wing, this four bedroom, two bathroom beauty has gracious lounge and dining rooms stretched across the front and spacious family living and dining (with room for a study nook) stretching out to an undercover al fresco area at the rear. With robes for every bedroom, a classic kitchen and period style bathrooms, there's the perfect mix of period detail (including polished boards, strapped ceilings and leadlight) and modern amenity (including a quality appliance kitchen, zoned heating/cooling & off-street parking). In the Zone and close to the North Rd bus, this is gracious, spacious period living. Land 664sqm (approx) (PLUS the potential to acquire an additional adjoining 66sqm (approx) at 50% below market cost giving you a total of 730sqm (approx)) STCA of prime Ormond real estate!
4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (rear kids' wing)
lounge, dining, family zone, classic kitchen
zoned heating/cooling, parking, family-size gardens
McKinnon College Zone, premier address

Description:
Masterpiece in the making
Already extended to offer flexible up to 3 bedrooms, dual living accommodation, this widespread 1920's home stars outstanding period detail (including rich timber panelling, lavish leadlight & decorative ceilings) through fine formal rooms...& a flexible split-level family-room. Bring your vision to this period beauty & be rewarded by an accommodating floorplan with all you need to enjoy family life in the College Zone sketched in already. Set in a period-perfect streetscape on around 6566sqft/610sqm between the Ormond & McKinnon shopping strips, this one is a masterpiece in the making!
up to 3 bedrooms
formal lounge, split-level family living
approx 6566sqft/610sqm gardens
McKinnon College Zone, walk to stations

Description:
Sizeable apartment in the Zone
Zone in on a super-sized investment opportunity! In a rare Zone apartment group, this spacious first-floor apartment is sized up with two generous robe-fitted double bedrooms, a hallway large enough to fit a study nook and a balconied lounge PLUS a bonus dining-room - perfect for entertaining or home-office. Gas heated with a dishwasher for the classic modern kitchen, intercom for secure entry and a carspace out front, this quality apartment is even big on value-adding benefits with a prized McKinnon College Zone address and the opportunity to retain an excellent existing tenant. Just a two minute walk to the shops and two minutes more to the station, this one will let you live large!
2 double bedrooms, big bathroom, sep WC
Modern kitchen, lounge, separate dining
Gas-heater, intercom, robes, balcony, carspace
Walk to station, prized Zone address

Description:
Understated Luxury
Designed by Burns Goldberg Architects this family-sized large residence offers a generous plan that is fluid, clean-lined & contemporary, this stylishly presented, architect designed home offers the ultimate lifestyle of low-maintenance luxury in the coveted McKinnon Secondary Zone. Designer style & quality delineates the impressively spacious formal & informal living zones, dream Euro kitchen, downstairs guest bedroom, fitted study & an alfresco deck & garden beside a sparkling pool.
Eyal Malka 0414 778 837
Nikki Janover 0412 496 545

Description:
Develop a Designer Dream in the McKinnon zone!
If you could pick a dream location...this is it! The existing spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with in-ground pool offers substantial scope to renovate and update or utilise the plans prepared by renowned Brighton designer Shane LaPeyre and build two massive up-market 35 square (approx) side by side double storey townhouses with 4 bedrooms plus media room! With permits in place, the dream awaits to enjoy the benefits and options available on 730sqm (approx) of blue-chip real estate walking distance to Joyce Park, Ormond train station & shopping strip & in-zone McKinnon Primary School & Secondary College!
Update or develop...plans & permits provided
McKinnon Secondary College zone
Close to schools, parks, shops & station
